languages.text: "Суждение о них было верным. Незнание было исправлено, чистота и верность стали абсолютными. Недоверчивый Кастэс даровал нам свой Скепсис, говорящий с духами Ликут — не знающую сомнений Веру. Логика и Паранойя не имели имен в прошлой жизни, но разумы их остры и уникальны".

traits.locale_text: "Суждение о них было верным. Незнание было исправлено, чистота и верность стали абсолютными. Недоверчивый Кастэс даровал нам свой Скепсис, говорящий с духами Ликут — не знающую сомнений Веру. Логика и Паранойя не имели имен в прошлой жизни, но разумы их остры и уникальны".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "My assessment of them was correct. Ignorance was remedied. Purity and loyalty were raised to an absolute degree. Kastaes, the doubter, gave us his Scepticism; Likut, the spirit-talker, his unflinching Faith. Logic and Paranoia had no names in their past lives, but their minds are sharp and singular."
languages.original_text: "Суждение о них было верным. Незнание было исправлено, чистота и верность стали абсолютными. Недоверчивый Кастэс даровал нам свой Скепсис, говорящий с духами Ликут — не знающую сомнений Веру. Логика и Паранойя не имели имен в прошлой жизни, но разумы их остры и уникальны".

traits.locale_text: "My assessment of them was correct. The lack of knowledge was made up for. The purity and the loyalty were raised to an absolute degree. Kastaes, the doubter, gave us his Scepticism; Likut, the spirit-talker, his unflinching Faith. Logic and Paranoia had no names in their past lives, but their minds are sharp and unique."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

Kastaes, the doubter, gave us his Scepticism; Likut, the spirit-talker, his unflinching Faith. Logic and Paranoia had no names in their past lives, but their minds are sharp and unique."

traits.locale_text: "My assessment of them was correct. Ignorance was remedied. Purity and loyalty were raised to an absolute degree. Kastaes, the doubter, gave us his Scepticism; Likut, the spirit-talker, his unflinching Faith. Logic and Paranoia had no names in their past lives, but their minds are sharp and singular."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我对他们的评估是正确的。错误得到了纠正，纯洁与忠诚被提高到了不可动摇的程度。质疑者卡斯塔斯赋予了我们他的怀疑，言灵者利库特赋予了我们他不可动摇的信仰。至于逻辑与偏执，他们并没有名字，但他们的思想同样敏锐，同样不同凡响。”
languages.original_text: "My assessment of them was correct. Ignorance was remedied. Purity and loyalty were raised to an absolute degree. Kastaes, the doubter, gave us his Scepticism; Likut, the spirit-talker, his unflinching Faith. Logic and Paranoia had no names in their past lives, but their minds are sharp and singular."

traits.locale_text: “我对他们的评估是正确的。错误得到了纠正，纯洁与忠诚被提高到了不可动摇的程度。质疑者卡斯塔斯赋予了我们他的怀疑，言灵者利库特赋予了我们他不可动摇的信仰。至于逻辑与偏执，他们并没有名字，但他们的思想同样敏锐，同样不同凡响。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Mi evaluación de los involucrados era correcta. Se remedió la ignorancia y se alcanzó el grado máximo de pureza y lealtad. Kastaes, que dudaba, nos legó su Escepticismo. Likut, que hablaba con los espíritus, nos transmitió su Fe inquebrantable. Lógica y Paranoia no tenían nombres en sus vidas anteriores, pero sus mentes son agudas y únicas».
languages.original_text: "My assessment of them was correct. Ignorance was remedied. Purity and loyalty were raised to an absolute degree. Kastaes, the doubter, gave us his Scepticism; Likut, the spirit-talker, his unflinching Faith. Logic and Paranoia had no names in their past lives, but their minds are sharp and singular."

traits.locale_text: «Mi evaluación de los involucrados era correcta. Se remedió la ignorancia y se alcanzó el grado máximo de pureza y lealtad. Kastaes, que dudaba, nos legó su Escepticismo. Likut, que hablaba con los espíritus, nos transmitió su Fe inquebrantable. Lógica y Paranoia no tenían nombres en sus vidas anteriores, pero sus mentes son agudas y únicas».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「彼らに対する私の評価は正しかった。無知は改善された。純粋さと忠誠心は絶対的なものへと高められた。疑い深いカスタエスは懐疑主義を、精霊語りのリクートは揺るぎない信仰を我々に与えた。ロジックとパラノイアは前世では名前を持たなかったが、彼らの心は鋭く特異なものだ」
languages.original_text: "My assessment of them was correct. Ignorance was remedied. Purity and loyalty were raised to an absolute degree. Kastaes, the doubter, gave us his Scepticism; Likut, the spirit-talker, his unflinching Faith. Logic and Paranoia had no names in their past lives, but their minds are sharp and singular."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らに対する私の評価は正しかった。無知は改善された。純粋さと忠誠心は絶対的なものへと高められた。疑い深いカスタエスは懐疑主義を、精霊語りのリクートは揺るぎない信仰を我々に与えた。ロジックとパラノイアは前世では名前を持たなかったが、彼らの心は鋭く特異なものだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Meine Beurteilung war korrekt. Ignoranz wurde beseitigt. Reinheit und Loyalität würden auf ein absolutes Maß angehoben. Kastaes, der Zweifler, hat seine Skepsis aufgegeben; Likut, der Seelenflüsterer, seinen unerschütterlichen Glaube. Logik und Paranoia hatten in ihren früheren Leben keine Namen, doch ihr Verstand ist scharf und einzigartig."
languages.original_text: "My assessment of them was correct. Ignorance was remedied. Purity and loyalty were raised to an absolute degree. Kastaes, the doubter, gave us his Scepticism; Likut, the spirit-talker, his unflinching Faith. Logic and Paranoia had no names in their past lives, but their minds are sharp and singular."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Beurteilung war korrekt. Ignoranz wurde beseitigt. Reinheit und Loyalität würden auf ein absolutes Maß angehoben. Kastaes, der Zweifler, hat seine Skepsis aufgegeben; Likut, der Seelenflüsterer, seinen unerschütterlichen Glaube. Logik und Paranoia hatten in ihren früheren Leben keine Namen, doch ihr Verstand ist scharf und einzigartig."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je les avais correctement jugés. L'ignorance a été résolue. La pureté et la loyauté sont passées à un niveau absolu. Kastaes, le sceptique, nous a donné son Doute ; Likut, qui parle aux esprits, sa Foi infaillible. La Logique et la Paranoïa ne portaient aucun nom dans leur vie d'antan, mais leur âme est affûtée et singulière. »
languages.original_text: "My assessment of them was correct. Ignorance was remedied. Purity and loyalty were raised to an absolute degree. Kastaes, the doubter, gave us his Scepticism; Likut, the spirit-talker, his unflinching Faith. Logic and Paranoia had no names in their past lives, but their minds are sharp and singular."

traits.locale_text: « Je les avais correctement jugés. L'ignorance a été résolue. La pureté et la loyauté sont passées à un niveau absolu. Kastaes, le sceptique, nous a donné son Doute ; Likut, qui parle aux esprits, sa Foi infaillible. La Logique et la Paranoïa ne portaient aucun nom dans leur vie d'antan, mais leur âme est affûtée et singulière. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "My assessment of them was correct. Ignorance was remedied. Purity and loyalty were raised to an absolute degree. Kastaes, the doubter, gave us his Scepticism; Likut, the spirit-talker, his unflinching Faith. Logic and Paranoia had no names in their past lives, but their minds are sharp and singular."

languages.text: "Onlara dair değerlendirmem doğru çıktı. Cehalete çare bulundu. Saflık ve sadakat, azami seviyeye çıkarıldı. Şüpheci Kastaes bize Kuşkuculuk'u, ruhlarla konuşan Likut da sarsılmaz İnanç'ı bahşetti. Mantık ve Paranoya'nın önceki hayatlarında isimleri olmasa da zihinleri keskin ve özgün."
languages.original_text: "My assessment of them was correct. Ignorance was remedied. Purity and loyalty were raised to an absolute degree. Kastaes, the doubter, gave us his Scepticism; Likut, the spirit-talker, his unflinching Faith. Logic and Paranoia had no names in their past lives, but their minds are sharp and singular."

traits.locale_text: "Onlara dair değerlendirmem doğru çıktı. Cehalete çare bulundu. Saflık ve sadakat azami seviyeye çıkarıldı. Şüpheci Kastaes bize Kuşkuculuk'unu, ruhlarla konuşan Likut da sarsılmaz İnanç'ını verdi. Mantık ve Paranoya'nın önceki hayatlarında isimleri yoktu ancak zihinleri keskin ve özgün."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
